name: Scenes from Sci560
description:
Sci560 is coming to an end — this is your last chance to experience it in all its glory!
This weekend, join our Sci560 mediators, Aditi and Gokul for one final guided walkthrough. Immerse yourself in an engaging exploration of how Bengaluru’s rich history has helped shape the city’s identity. Discover how science and technology have been a part of Namma Bengaluru’s story across time.
